name: re-indexer
description: Cost-efficient POC for repackaging YouTube videos against trending topics

scripts.ingest: npm run build && node dist/cli.js ingest
scripts.trends: npm run build && node dist/cli.js trends
scripts.match: npm run build && node dist/cli.js match
scripts.ui: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/server.js dotenv_config_path=.env
